contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=February 2013}} {{ infobox football league | name = MacWhirter Welsh League Third Division | logo = | pixels = 100 | country = {{WAL}} | confed = | founded = 1904 | folded = | divisions = | teams = 16 | feeds = | promotion = [[Welsh Football League Division Two]] | relegation = Carmarthenshire League Premier Division<br />[[Gwent County League|Gwent County League Division One]]<br />[[Neath & District League|Neath & District League Premier Division]]<br />Pembrokeshire League Division One<br />[[South Wales Amateur League|South Wales Amateur League Division One]]<br />[[South Wales Senior League|South Wales Senior League Division One]]<br />Swansea Senior League Division One | levels = | domest_cup = [[Welsh Cup]]<br>[[Welsh Football League Cup|League Cup]] | confed_cup = | champions = [[Cardiff Metropolitan University F.C.|Cardiff Metropolitan University]] | season = [[2012-13 in Welsh football|2012-13]] | most successful club = | tv = | website = [http://www.welshleague.org.uk/index.htm The Welsh Football League] | current = [[2013â€“14 Welsh Football League Division Three]] }} Division Three of the [[Welsh Football League]] (currently the ''MacWhirter Welsh League Division Three'', for sponsorship reasons) is a [[football (soccer)|football]] league and forms the fourth level of the [[Welsh football league system]] in south [[Wales]]. If the team which finishes top of the Division has good enough ground facilities, it is promoted to the [[Welsh Football League Division Two]] and is replaced by the team finishing bottom of Division Two. The team finishing in bottom position is relegated to one of the local leagues. ==Membership of the Welsh Football League Division Three, season 2012-13== *[[Abertillery Bluebirds F.C.|Abertillery Bluebirds]] *[[A.F.C. Llwydcoed|AFC Llwydcoed]] *[[Bettws F.C.|Bettws (Bridgend)]] *[[Bridgend Street A.F.C.|Bridgend Street]] *[[Cardiff Grange Harlequins A.F.C.|Cardiff Grange Harlequins]] *[[Cardiff Metropolitan University F.C.|Cardiff Metropolitan University ]] *[[Chepstow Town F.C.|Chepstow Town]] *[[Llantwit Major F.C.|Llantwit Major]] *[[Llanwern A.F.C.|Llanwern]] *[[Newcastle Emlyn F.C.|Newcastle Emlyn]] *[[Newport Civil Service F.C.|Newport Civil Service]] *[[Pontypridd Town A.F.C.|Pontypridd Town]] *[[Risca United F.C.|Risca United]] *[[Tredegar Town F.C.|Tredegar Town]] *[[Treharris Athletic Western F.C.|Treharris Athletic Western Stars]] *[[Treowen Stars F.C.|Treowen Stars]] ==External links== *[http://www.welshleague.org.uk/ League website] ==References== {{reflist}} ==See also== *[[Football in Wales]] *[[Welsh football league system]] *[[Welsh Cup]] *[[Welsh League Cup]] *[[FAW Premier Cup]] *[[List of football clubs in Wales]] *[[List of stadiums in Wales by capacity]] {{Welsh Football League Division Three teamlist}} {{Football in Wales}} [[Category:Welsh Football League|3]] [[Category:Football leagues in Wales|4]] {{Wales-footy-competition-stub}}
